Name: nep-ahlalhadithcent-la
Author: Ahl Al Hadith Central Society Of Nepal

Translations.Text: Tyo jasako hatama rajyasatta cha, bado kalyanakari cha, ra jo hareka kurama samathryavana cha
Jasale mrtyu ra jivanala'i yasakarana srsti gareko cha, ki timro pariksa garos, ki timimadhye ramro kama ko gardacha? Ra u adhipatyasali ra ksamasila cha
Jasale mathi satavata akasaharu banayo ta hernevala allaha–rahamanako racanama kunai visangati dekhne chaina. Dosro pataka drsti utha'era hera ke kunai cira drstigocara huncha
pheri dohorya'era du'i–du'i pataka dekhile'u, timro drsti timro tarpha apamanita ra kamajora bha'era pharki a'unecha
Nihsandeha hamile akasala'i sansarako prakasaka lagi bhavya dipabata sajayaum, ra uniharula'i saitanala'i hanne madhyama banayaum, ra saitanaharuko lagi hamile narkako sajaya tayara garirakheka chaum
Ra jasale aphno palanakartasita kuphra gare, uniharuko nimti narkako yatana cha, ra tyo dherai naramro tha'um ho
Jaba tyasama yiniharu halinechan, taba tyasako citkarako avaja sunnechan ra tyasale bhadakiraheko hunecha
Yasto lagcha ki krodhale cyatijancha jaba yasama kunai samuha halinecha usita narkaka d'dharapaleharule sodhnechan, ‘‘ke timro pasama kohi savadhana garnevala a'ena?’’

Uniharule bhannechanh (kina ho'ina), avasya savadhana garnevala a'eko thiyo. Tara hamile usala'i asatya thaharayaum ra bhan'yaum ki allahale ta kunai kura avatarita garekai chaina. Timi ta thulo bhramama parirakheka chau
Ra bhannechanh yadi hamile sunne ra bujhne bha'eko bha'e narakiharumadhyeka hune thi'enaum
Yasaprakara uniharule aphna aparadhaharula'i svikara garnechan. Tasartha aba yi narakiharu tadha rahun
Nihsandeha juna manisaharu paroksama aphno palanakartasita darane gardachan. Uniharuko nimti ksama ra thulo pratiphala cha
Timiharule kura luka'era bhana va prakatarupale, usale hrdayaka rahasyaharusameta jandacha
Ke usale janne chaina jasale srsti gareko cha? Jabaki u suksmadarsi ra hareka kurabata avagata pani cha

Uhi ta ho jasale timro nimti dharatila'i narama ra adhinastha garyo. Taki timile usaka batoharuma hinddula garnegara ra allahad'dhara pradana gari'eko jivika upabhoga gara, ra timile usaiko pasama dosropataka jivita bha'era januparnecha
Ke timi yasa kurabata niscinta chau ki akasavalale timila'i dharatima gadide'os ani tyasabela prthvima kampana hunathalos
Va ke timi yasa kurabata niscinta chau ki akasavalale timimathi patharako varsa garide'os? Ani timila'i thaha bha'ihalnecha ki mero cetavani kasto thiyo
Ra yinibhanda pahilaka manisaharule pani jhutha thahara'eka thi'e, atah herihala ki unimathi mero yatana kasto bhayo

ke yiniharule aphna ta'ukaharumathi pakheta phaila'era va khumcya'era udirakheka panksiharula'i dekhenan? Allahale nai uniharula'i havama thami rakheko huncha. Nihsandeha tyasale hareka kurala'i dekhirakheko cha
Allaha baheka timro kuna cahim sena cha, jasale timro sahayata garna sakos. Kaphiraharu ta bhramama chan
Yadi allahale aphno jivika banda garidincha bhane bhana tyo ko ho jasale timila'i jivika dincha? Tara yiniharu ateripana ra ghrnama aljheka chan
Tyo vyakti badhi margadarsana prapta gareko cha jo ta'uko tekera himdacha va tyo vyakti jasale sojho (khutta tekera) batoma hindcha
bhanidinus tyo allaha nai ho, jasale timila'i paida garyo ra timra kana, amkha ra hrdayako racana garyo tara timile kama krtajnata dekha'umchau
Bhanidinus ki uhi ho, jasale timila'i dharatima phailayo ra usaiko samu timiharu ekatrita garinechau
Kaphiraharule bhandachanh ki yadi timi samco hau bhane tyo vaca kahile hunecha bata'u
tapa'i bhanidinus ki yasako jnana ta matra allahala'i nai cha ra ma spastarupale dara suna'unevala hum
Jaba uniharule tyasa vacala'i najikabata hernechan ta kaphiharuko anuhara tyasabela bigrihalnecha ra uniharusita bhaninecha ki yo tyahi ho jasako timile manga garne gardathyau
Tapa'i bhanidinus ki hera yadi allahale mala'i ra mera sathiharula'i nasta garide'os va hamimathi daya garos, ta ko cha jasale kaphiraharula'i duhkhada yatanabata baca'una sakdacha
tapa'i bhanidinus ki uhi allaha–rahamana ho, hamile usaimathi imana lya'eka chaum ra usaimathi bharosa gardachaum. Timila'i chittai thaha bha'ihalne cha ki khulla marga vicalinama ko cha
tapa'i bhanidinus ki yo ta bata'u ki yadi timro (pi'une) pani sukhihalcha bhane ko cha jasale timila'i nirmala jala pravahita garidinecha
nuna, kasama cha kalamako ra tyasako juna kuro tiniharu (pharistaharu) lekhdachan
Ki (he muham'mada sallallaho alaihe vasallama) tapa'i aphno palanakartako anukampabata ba'ulaha ho'ina
Ra nihsandeha tapa'iko lagi anta na hunevala bado anukampa cha
Nihsandeha tapa'i ucca acaranavala hunuhuncha
Aba timile dekhnechau ra yiniharule pani dekhihalnechan
ki timimadhyebata ko bhramita bha'eko cha
Nihsandeha timro palanakartale usala'i ramrari jandacha, jo aphno batobata vicalita bha'eka chan ra uniharula'i pani ramrari jandacha, jo sojho margama hidirakheka chan
Tasartha timile asatya thahara'uneharuko bhana'i namannu
Tiniharule cahanchan ki timi ali narama bha'ihala. Ani yiniharu narama bha'ihalnechan
Ra timile kunai yasto vyaktiko bhana'i namannu jasale dherai kasama kha'irahancha
Badanama arkako durgana varnana garnevala ra cukli gardai hiddacha
(Ra jo)ramro kurabata roknevala, simako ullanghana garnevala, thulo aparadhi, (ho)
Ghamandi ra tyo pani jaraja
Usako ateripana matra yasakarana cha ki tyo dhanavana ra choraharuvala cha
jaba usaka samu hamra ayataharu padhera suna'inchan, taba bhancha ki yi ta pahilaka manisaharuka katha hun
Hamile pani (sighra nai) usako nakama daga laga'unechaum

Nihsandeha hamile uniharuko yastai prakarale pariksa li'ekachaum juna prakarale bagavalaharuko pariksa li'eka thiyaum, jabaki uniharule kasama kha'e ki pratahkala hunasatha avasya tyasa bagaicaka phala tipnechaum
Ra ‘‘insa'allaha’’(yadi allahale cahyo) bhanenan
tasartha uniharumathi uniharu sutirakhekai belama timro palanakartako tarphabata e'uta vipadale cakkara laga'ihalyo
Taba tyo bagaica yasto bha'ihalyo jasto ki kati'eko kheti
jaba bihana bhayo taba uniharule eka arkala'i pukarna thale
ki yadi timile phala tipnu cha bhane aphno khetima bihanai a'ipuga
Pheri tiniharu vistarai–vistarai yo kura gardai hinde
Ki aja yaham timro pasama kohi gariba a'una napa'os
ra uniharu lamkadai bihanai puge, ki hami samathryavana hunechaum
Jaba uniharule bagala'i dekhe ta bhannathale ki hami niscayanai bato birsisakeka chaum
ho'ina, ho'ina baru hamro bhagya nai pherisakyo
E'uta juna uniharumadhye bud'dhimana thiyo usale bhan'yo, ke maile timisita bhaneko thi'ena ki timile allahako pavitratako varnana kina gardainau
Taba uniharu sabaile bhannathale ki hamro palanakarta pavitra cha, niscaya nai hami nai atyacari thiyaum
ani uniharu eka arkatira mukha pharka'i paraspara dhikkarna thale
bhanna thale, haya aphasoca hami nai hadabhanda agadi ga'isakeka thiyaum
Asa cha ki hamro palanakartale yasako satta hamiharula'i yasabhanda ramro badala pradana garos, hami ta aba aphno palanakartabatai asanvita hunchaum
(Hera) vipada yastai a'umcha ra paralokako vipada dherai thulo cha, yadi yo kura uniharule bujhnasakne bha'e
Niscaya nai sanyamiharuko nimti uniharuko palanakartakaham upaharavala svargaharu chan
Ke hami ajnakariharula'i aparadhiharu jasto garidinechaum
timila'i ke bha'eko cha, kasto nirnaya gardaichau
ke timro pasama kunai kitaba cha jasabata timi (yo) padhchau
ki timile ruca'une kuraharu tyasama ho'un
va timiharule hamisita kunai sapatha li'ekachau? Juna kayamatako dinasam'ma bamki rahanecha, ki timro nimti tyo sabai cha juna timile aphno tarphabata phaisala gardachau
Uniharusita sodha ki uniharumadhye yasako jim'mavala ko ho
ke (yasa bhana'ima) unaka aru pani sajhedara chan? Yadi uni samco chan bhane aphno sajhedaraharula'i lya'i agadi ubhya'un
Juna dina ghumda kholidi'inecha ra uniharu sajadako nimti bola'ine chan, taba tiniharule sijda garnasakne chainan
Amkhaharu tala jhukeka hunechan, ra unimathi apamana cha'irakheko hunecha. Uniharula'i tyasa bela pani dhogako nimti bola'inthyo jabaki uniharu thikathaka thi'e
Atah timile mala'i ra mera vanila'i jhutha bhanneharula'i chadide'u. Hamile uniharula'i vistarai yasto tarikale samatne chaum ki unala'i thaha pani hunechaina
Maile unala'i mohalata di'irakhnechu, nihsandeha mero yojana dherai baliyo cha
Ke timi uniharusita kehi badala mamgirakheka chau ki uniharu tyasako bojhabata thicindai ga'irakheka chan
Va ke uniharuko pasama paroksako jnana cha jasala'i uni lekhdai ga'eka chan
atah aphno palanakartako adesala'i tapa'ile dhairyasita pratiksa garnus ra machavala jastai nahunu, ki unale gahiro duhkhako avasthama prarthana gareka thi'e
Yadi unako sathama unako palanakartako anukampa nabha'eko bha'e uni khulla maidanama phyamkine thi'e, ra unako avastha naramro hune thiyo
Antatah unako palanakartale pheri unala'i rojihalyo ra unala'i ramra manisaharuma sam'milita garidiyo
Ra najika cha ki kaphiraharule aphno tivra drstibata tapa'ila'i ciplya'i dinechan, jaba uni ‘‘kura'ana’’ sundachan ra bhanidinchan ki yini ta avasya divana chan
Vastavama yo (kura'ana) ta sabai sansaravalaharuko nimti purai upadesa ho
Vastavama bha'era nai chadnevala
pramanita hunevala ke ho
ra timila'i ke thaha cha ki tyo vastavika pramanita hunevala ke ho
tyasa thulo svarako kara'une gadgad'ahata valala'i ‘‘samuda’’ ra ‘‘ada’’ (duvai) le asatya maneka thi'e
Jasako parinamama ‘‘samuda’’la'i bhayankara catayangabata nasta gariyo
Ra ‘‘ada’’ thulo tivra huribata samapta gari'e
Jasala'i allahale sata rata ra atha dinasam'ma nirantara uniharumathi laga'eko thiyo taba timile uniharula'i bhu'imma yasari ladeko avasthama dekhyau jasto ki khajuraka khokra botaharu
Ke timi uniharumadhye kohila'i pani sesa dekhiraheka chau
‘‘phira'auna’’ usabhanda pahilaka manisaharu ra jasako ga'um bastiharu ulatapalata bha'e, uniharule pani aparadha gardathe
Ra uniharule aphno palanakartako paigambarako avajna gare, taba allahale unala'i pani kathora pakadama li'ihalyo
Jaba panima halacala ayo taba tyasa bela hamile timila'i naukama savara garayaum
Taki tyasala'i timro nimti siksa bana'idi'aum ra yadagarne kanale suraksita rakhun
Tasartha jaba surama ekaphumka phumkinecha
ra dharati ra pahada duvai utha'inechan, ra ekaicoti ksataviksata garinechan
Ta tyasadina ghatita hunevala kayamata bha'ihalne cha
Ra akasa phatine cha ani tyo tyasadina ekadama kamajora bha'ihalnecha
Ra pharistaharu usako kinarama hunechan ra tyasadina timro palanakartako sinhasanala'i atha pharistaharule aphumathi ucaleka hunechan
Tyasadina timi sabai samunne prastuta garinechau, (ra) timro kunai bheda lukirahane chaina
Ani josukaila'i usako karmapatra usako dahine hatama di'inecha, tyasale (arusita) bhannechah ki linus mero karmapatra padhnus
Mala'i pura yakina thiyo ki mero hisaba mala'i avasya prapta hunecha
Atah tyo (vyakti) anandita jivanama hunecha
Ucca, bhavya svargama
jasaka phalaharuka gucchaharu jhundi'eka hunechan
(Uniharusita bhaninecha) juna karma timiharule aghika dinaharuma agadi patha'isakeka chau, tyasako pratiphalasvarupa majasita kha'u ra pi'u
Tara jasako karmapatra usako bayam hatama di'inecha, tyasale bhannecha, kasa kati ramro hunthyo ki mero karmapatra mala'i nadi'eko bha'e
Ra mala'i thaha nabha'eko bha'e ki mero hisaba ke cha
Ai kasa, mrtyule mero kama nai samapta garisakne thiyo
(Aja) mero sampatti pani mero kehi kama lagena
(Aha) mero varcasva mabata ga'ihalyo
(Adesa hunecha ki) yasala'i samata ra yasala'i bamdhihala challa pahira'idinu
Ani yasala'i narkama halide'u
Ani janjirale jasako napa sattari hatha cha, jakadide'u
Niscitarupale yasale mahimavana allahamathi imana rakhdainathyo
ra na garibala'i khana khuva'una protsahita gardathyo
atah aja yasako yaham na kohi mitra cha
Ra na pipa baheka usako nimti aja kunai khana cha
Jasala'i aparadhiharu baheka kasaile khane chaina
Atah hamila'i ti kuraharuko kasama cha juna timile dekhdachau
ra (kasama cha) ti kurako juna timile dekhdainau
Ki yo kura'ana eka pratisthita rasulabata lya'i'eko vani ho
Ra yo kunai kaviko vani ho'ina. Parantu timiharule bahuta kama visvasa gardaichau
ra na yo kunai jyotisiko vani ho, tara timiharule thorai siksa prapta gardachau
(Yo ta) sampurna sansarako palanakartabata avatarita gari'eko ho
Ra yadi yasa paigambarale hamro barema kunai jhutha kura bana'era lya'eko bha'e
ta hamile unala'i dahine hatabata samatihalthyaum
Ani unako hrdayako dhamani katidinthyaum
Ani timimadhye kohi pani hamila'i yasabata roknevala humdainathyo
Ra nihsandeha yo (kura'ana) parahejagaraharuko (amatmasayammiharuko) nimti e'uta upadesa ho
Ra hamila'i thaha cha ki timimadhye kehi yasala'i asatya bhannevala chan
Sathai (yo jhutha mannu) apasoca cha kaphiraharuko lagi
Yo nihsandeha bilkula visvasaniya satya ho
Atah timile aphno mahimavan palanakartako namako gunagana gara
E'uta mamgnevalale (rasulasita) tyo yatana mamgyo, juna ghatita hunevala cha
Kaphiraharubata kasaile tyasala'i talna saknechaina
Allahako tarphabata hunecha, juna (cadhnako lagi) sopanavala cha
Jasatira pharistaharu ra ‘‘ruha’’ cadhchan eka dinama tyasako anumanita avadhi 50 hajara varsako hunecha
Arthat timi ramro samga dhairya gara
Nihsandeha uniharuko drstima tyo ajaba tadha cha
Ra hamro drstima najika cha
Juna dina akasa jaleko tela jasto bha'ihalnecha
Ra pahadaharu rangina unako jasta hunechan
ra kunai mitrale kunai mitrala'i sodhnechaina
(Jabaki) eka arkala'i agadi dekhirakheka hunechan. (Tyasa dina) aparadhile iccha garnecha ki (yatanako sattama) aphna choraharu (de'os)
Ra aphno patni ra aphno bha'i
ra aphno parivara jasale usala'i sarana dinthyo
Ra jati manisaharu dharatima chan sabai kura dina cahanecha jasale usala'i yatanabata mukta gara'ihalos
(Tara) yasto kahilyai hunechaina, nihsandeha tyo prajvalita ago ho
jasale anuhara ra ta'ukoko chala upka'idinecha
usale tyasto pratyeka manisala'i aphutira bola'unecha (jasale satya dharmabata) pithyum pharka'era vimukha bha'e
ra dhana ekatrita garera thuparera rakhe
nihsandeha manisa kamco mutuvala bana'i'eko cha
Jaba usala'i kasta pugcha ta attincha
Tara jaba usala'i rahata (sampannata) prapta huncha ta usale kanjusi dekha'umcha
Tara namaja padhneharuko kura arkai cha
Jasale namaja niyamittakasatha padhdachan
ra jasako sampattima(aruko) haka niscita cha
(arthat) mamgnevalako ra namamgnevalako pani
jasale n'yayako dina(kayamata) mathi imana rakhdacha
Ra jo aphno palanakartako yatanabata dara'uchan
nihsandeha uniharuko palanakartako yatana yasto chaina jasabata niscinta rahana sakiyos
Ra jo aphno guptangaharuko raksa gardachan
Tara aphna patniharu va dasiharu baheka juna unako adhinastha chan ta unako lagi kunai aphasoca chaina
jasale yo baheka aru cahanchan uniharu sima ullanghana garnevala hun
Ra jasale aphumathi gari'eka visvasaharu ra aphule gareko vacana ra kararako palana gardachan
ra jo aphno gavahima drdha rahanchan
ra jo aphno namajako raksa gardachan
yinai manisaharu svargaharuma sam'manapurvaka rahanechan
pheri inkara garnevalala'i ke bha'eko cha ki dauddai a'iraheka chan
dayam ra bayambata samuhako rupama
Ke uniharumadhye pratyeka vyakti, yo lalasa rakhdaicha ki uni anukampabata paripurna svargama pravesa garnechan
tyasto kadapi hunechaina. Baru hamile uniharula'i juna cijabata srsti gareka chaum, tyasala'i uniharu jandachan
Atah kehi chaina, ma purva ra pascimako palanakartako sapatha linchu ki hamila'i samathrya prapta cha
Ki uniharuko tha'umma uniharubhanda ramro manisaharu lya'um ra hami parasta hunevala chainaum
Atah uniharula'i lada'i–bhida'i gareko avasthama chadidinus. Yahamsam'ma ki aphno tyasa dinasam'ma pugi ja'un. Jasako vaca uniharusita gari'eko cha
Junadina uniharu cihanabata tivratako satha dauddai niskanechan. Manaum ki, kunai (visesa) tha'umtira dauddai ga'iraheka chan
Uniharuko amkha lajjale jhukirahane chan ra apamana uniharumathi gherirakhnecha. Yo nai tyo dina ho, jasako unirusamga vaca garidai thiyo

Hamile ‘‘nuha (alaihis'salama) la'i’’ niscitarupale unako kaumatira pathayaum ki aphno kaumaka manisaharula'i dara'u ra savadhana garide'u, yasabhanda pahila ki uniharumathi kunai duhkhada yatana a'os
Unale bhane ‘‘he mero kaumaka manisaharu! Ma timro nimti e'uta spasta sacetakarta hum
Ki! Allahako upasana gara ra usita dara ra mero bhana'i mana

Taba usale timro papa ksama garidinecha ra niscita samayasam'ma timila'i mohalata pradana garnecha. Nihsandeha jaba allahale nirdharana gareko samaya a'ipugcha taba vilamba humdaina, kasa timile jannebha'eko bha'e
Nuhale bhane ki, he mero palanakarta! Maile aphno jatibandhula'i ratadina timrotarpha bola'une gare
tara mero pukarabata uniharu jhan tadhidai ga'e
Jahilepani maile uniharula'i timro ksamatarpha bola'em, uniharule aphna kanala'i aulale thune ra kapadale aphula'i chopihale ra ateri bha'era ghamanda gare
Ani maile unala'i thulo svarale bola'em
Ani nihsandeha maile uniharusita khulla taurale pani kuro garem ra uniharusita gopyarupale pani kura garem
Ra maile bhane kih aphno palanakartasita aphna papabata mukti gara'u ra ksama mamga. Niscaya nai u thulo ksamadata ho
Usale timimathi nikai varsa'unevala badala patha'une cha
Ra usale sampatti ra santanama timila'i badhottari pradana garnecha, ra timro nimti bagaincaharu paida garnecha ra timro nimti naharaharu pravahita garnecha
Timila'i ke bha'eko cha ki timile allahako sarvasresthatamathi imana rakhdainau
jabaki usale timila'i vibhinna avasthaharubata gujardai srsti gareko cha
Ke timile dekhenau ki allahale kasari e'utamathi arko gari satavata akasaharu bana'eko cha
ra uniharuma candrala'i jagamaga'umdo bana'eko cha, ra suryala'i prakasayukta dipa bana'eko cha
ra allahale nai timila'i dharatibata srsti gareko cha
ani tyasaima timila'i pharka'unecha ra timila'i nikali ubhya'unecha
Ra allahale nai dharatila'i timro nimti pharsa (ochyana) banayo
Taki usaka thula–thula vistrta margama hinda
Nuhale bhaneh ki ‘mero palanakarta uniharule mero avajna gare, ra usako anusarana gare jasako dhana ra jasako santanale unako ghatamai nai vrd'dhi garyo
Ra uniharule dherai thulo sadyantra gare
ra uniharule bhannathale ki aphna pujyaharula'i kadapi nachadnu ra khasagari ‘‘vadda’’ ra ‘‘suva'a’’ ra ‘‘yagusa’’ ra yaauka ra nasrala'i kadapi parityaga nagarnu
Ra uniharule dherai manisaharula'i pathavicalita garidi'eka chan, (he palanakarta) timile uniharula'i ajhai badhi pathabhrasta garide'u
Antatah uniharu aphna papaharuko karanale (jalapralayama) duba'i'e, ani narkama hali'e, ra uniharule allaha baheka kasaila'i aphno maddatagarne pa'enan
Ra nuhale prarthana gare ki he mero palanakarta dharatima basiraheko kunai kaphirala'i ramro avasthama nachada
Yadi timile uniharula'i chadadinechau bhane niscaya nai timra aru dasaharula'i pani pathabhrasta garidinechan, ra uniharule duracari ra thulo kaphiraharula'i nai janma dinechan

He mero palanakartah mala'i ra mero ama babula'i ra jo pani imanavala bha'era mero gharama a'e ra tamama imanavala purusaharu ra imana bha'eki striharula'i ksama garide'u ra atyacariharuko nimti ajhai vinasama vrd'dhi gara

(He paigambara sallallaho alaihe vasallama) bhanidinus ki mero pasama vahya a'eko cha ki jinnaharuko e'uta samuhale (kitabala'i) sunera bhanna thale ki hamile e'uta ascarya lagdo ‘‘kura'ana’’ sun'yaum
Jasale bhala'iko bato dekha'umcha, tasartha hamile tyasamathi imana lyayaum. (Aba) hamile aphno palanakartasamga kasaila'i kadapi sajhedara bana'une chainaum
Ra niscitarupale hamro palanakartako gaurava atyanta ucca cha usale aphno nimti kasaila'i na patni banayo na kunai santana
Ra yo ki hamimadhye kehi murkhale allahako barema asatya kura racdachan
ra hamile yo thaneka thiyaum ki manisa ra jinnaharu allahako barema jhutha boldainan
Kuro yo ho ki kehi manisaharule kehi jinnaharuko sarana mamgdathe, jasabata unako ateripana jhan badhihaleko thiyo
Ra manisaharule pani timi jinnaharu jastai anumana gareka thi'e ki allahale kasaila'i patha'une chaina, (va purnajivita garnechaina)
Ra yo ki hamiharule akasama ciyayaum, ta tyasala'i baliya paharedara ra prajvalita agole bhari'eko payaum
ra yo ki pahila hami akasama kaiyan tha'umharuma kura sunnako nimti basne gardathyaum. Ta ahile jo pani kana laga'umcha eka agoko jhilka aphnotira pa'umcha
Ra yo hami jandainaum ki tiniharuko satha jo dharatima chan naramro kurako irada gari'eko cha va uniharuko palanakartale uniharuko lagi bhalo garne vicara gareko cha
Ra yo ki hamimadhye kohi neka chan ra kohi viparita prakarako pani chan. Hami vibhinna kisimale bamdi'eka chaum
ra (yo ki) hamile visvasa garisakechaum ki hami dharatima allahala'i parajita garna sakdainau ra nabhagera usala'i thaka'una sakchaum
ra hamile ta margadarsana (ko kitaba) sun'yaum, ta tyasamathi imana lya'ihalyaum ra jasale aphno palanakartamathi imana lya'umcha usala'i na kunai haniko dara huncha, na atyacarako
ra yo ki hamimadhye kehi ajnakari chan ra kehi avajnakari chan, tasartha jo ajnakari bha'e, uniharu ta sojho margama hinde
ra jo papi(aparadhi) bha'e uniharu narkako indhana bha'e
ra (he paigambara! Yo pani uniharusita bhanidinus) ki yadi yiniharu sojho margama raheko bha'e hamile uniharuko nimti pi'unako lagi prasasta pani dinthyaum
Taki yasabata unako pariksa garaum ra juna manisale aphno palanakartako smaranabata mukha pharka'unecha, allahale usala'i duhkhada yatanama pravista garnecha
ra yo ki masjidaharu allahakai lagi matra hun, tasartha allahasamga kunai aruko puja nagara
ra jaba allahaka bhakta (muham'mada), usako pujako nimti ubhe ta kaphiraharule unala'i caraitarphabata gheri unimathi akramana garnevala thi'e
Bhanidinus ki ma ta aphno palanakartala'i matra puja gardachu. Ra usako satha kasaila'i sam'milita gardina
Yo pani bhanide'uh ki mala'i timro hakama napha noksanako kunai adhikara chaina
yo pani bhanidinus ki allaha (ko yatana) bata mala'i kasaile baca'una sakdaina ra ma usa baheka an'ya katai saranako tha'um dekhdina

ho, allahako tarphabata adesaharu ra usako sandesaharu purya'une kama (nai mero jim'mama cha) ra juna manisale allaha ra usako paigambarako avajna garnecha ta yastako lagi jahannamako ago cha, sadhaim tyasama rahanechan
yahamsam'ma ki aba yiniharule tyo (dina) dekhihalnechan, jasako unisita vaca gari'eko thiyo, taba unala'i thaha bha'ihalne cha ki kasaka sahayakaharu kamajora ra kasako sankhya thorai cha
bhanidinus ki juna timisita vaca garincha, mala'i thaha chaina ki tyo najika cha va mero palanakartale tyasako avadhi lamo garidi'eko cha
u adrsya jannevala cha ra kasaila'i aphno paroksako kura prakata gardaina
ho, juna paigambarala'i ruca'umcha, usa baheka, tara unako agadi ra pachadi pani raksakaharu khata'idincha
taki janakari liyos ki uniharule aphno palanakartako sandesa purya'idi'eka chan ra usale uniharuka sabai kuraharula'i niyantrita gareko cha ra hareka kurala'i ganisakeko cha
He (muham'mada sallallaho alaihe vasallama) lugama beri'eka
Rati uthera (namajako nimti) ubhine garnu tara thorai
Adharata va tyasabhanda kehi kama garnus
Va kehi badhi, ra vistarai roki–roki kura'ana padhne garnu
Niscitarupale hamile sighra nai tapa'imathi e'uta thulo kuro avatarita garnechaum
Nihsandeha rati uthnuma anukulata huncha ra kurala'i pani ramrosamga spasta garidincha
Dinako samayama ta tapa'ila'i an'ya dherai vyastata hunchan
Tapa'ile aphno palanakartako namako smarana garnu ra aru samasta kurala'i panchya'i sampurna hrdayale usaitira lagnu
Purva ra pascimako svami usabaheka kohi satya pujya chaina, atah timile usaila'i nai aphno karyasadhaka bana'ihala
Ra je jati kura yini bhandachana tyasala'i sahamdai garnu ra uniharubata ramrosita panchidai garnu
Ra mala'i jhutha thahara'une sukha–sampanna manisaharula'i chodidinu ra uniharula'i alikati mohalata de'u
Nihsandeha hamisamga kada nelaharu (hatakadi) chan ra prajvalita agoko narka cha
ra ghamtima adakine khana cha ra kastadayaka yatana cha
junadina dharati ra pahada kampita hunechan ra pahada baluvako dhisko jhaim hunechan
(he makkavalaharu ra) juna prakarale hamile phira'aunako pasama paigambara patha'eka thiyaum. Timro pasama pani (muham'mada) rasula patha'eka chaum, jo timro sambandhama saksi hunechan
Phira'aunale tyasa rasulako avajna garyo ta hamile usala'i kathora yatanama samatihalyaum
Yadi timile pani manne chainau bhane tyasadinabata kasari bamcchau, juna dina baccaharula'i vrd'dha bana'idinecha
Juna dina akasa phatihalnecha. Yo allahako vaca pura bha'era nai rahanecha
Yo kura'ana ta niscaya nai e'uta upadesa ho. Aba jasale cahancha, aphno palanakartatira marga grahana garos

Nihsandeha tapa'iko palanakartale jandacha ki tapa'i ra tapa'iko, sathiharuko eka samuha lagabhaga du'i–tiha'i rata, adhi rata ra eka–tiha'i ratisam'ma (namajako nimti) ubhine gardacha. Rata ra dinako pura anumana allahale gardacha. Usala'i ramrari thaha cha ki timiharu tyasala'i sadhaim nirvaha garna sakdainau, ta usale timiharumathi krpa garyo atah timiharuko lagi jati kura'ana padhnu sajilo cha uttikai padhne gara. Usala'i thaha cha ki timimadhye kehi virami pani holan, ra kehi an'ya manisaharu allahako adara anugrahala'i khojdai dharatima jivikako khoji garnechan, ra kehi an'ya allahako margama yud'dha garnechan. Atah sajilosamga tyasa kura'anabata jati padhna sakdachau padha ra namaja padha ra jakata dindai gara, ra allahala'i ramro rna de'u, ra timile juna bhala'i aphno nimti agadi badha'unechau tyasala'i allahakaham ati uttama ra pratiphalako drstile dherai badhi pa'unechau. Allahasita ksamayacana garirakha. Nihsandeha allaha, atyanta ksamadata ra atyanta dayavana cha
He (muham'mada!) Luga bernevala
utha ra savadhana garidinu
Ra aphno palanakartako garima varnana garnu
Ra aphna kapad'aharula'i paka–pavitra rakhnu
Phohorapanala'i chadidinu
Ra bhala'i garera yasabhanda badhiline iccha nagarnu
Ra aphno palanakartako nimti dhairya garnu
Jaba surama phumka marinecha
Tyo dina bado kathora dina hunecha
Kaphiraharuko lagi sajilo hunechaina
Mala'i ra tyasala'i chadide'u jasala'i maile eklo srsti gareko chu
Ra prasasta mala–sampatti diyaum
Hareka samaya usako pasama upasthita rahane santanaharu pani
Maile usala'i hareka prakarako samagrima prasastata pradana garem
Ajhai usale iccha gardacha ki maile usala'i aru badhi pradana garum
Yasto kadapi hunechaina. Yo hamro ayataharuko satru rahadai a'eko cha
sighra nai maile usala'i kathina ukaloma uklana laga'une chu
Usale socyo ra adkalale e'uta kura banayo
Nasta hos usale kasto adkala garyo
pheri tyo nasta hos, usale kasto adkala garyo
usale pheri dekhyo
Pheri nidhara khumcyayo ra mukha bigarihalyo
Ani pithyum pharka'i hindyo ra ghamanda garyo
Ani bhannathalyo ki yo ta matra jadu ho, juna nakkala gari'eko cha
Yo matra manisako vani nai ho
Hamile sighra nai usala'i narkama halnechaum
Ra timila'i ke thaha ki ‘‘narka’’ ke ho
(ago ho) jo na bamki rakhnecha na ta choddacha
Ra sarirako chalala'i polera kalo bana'idinecha
Tyasama unna'isa (pharista) karyakartaharu niyukta chan

Ra hamile narkako dvarapalaharu pharistaharula'i bana'eka chaum ra hamile uniharuko sankhya kaphiraharuko pariksako nimti nirdharita gareka chaum, yasakarana ki kitabavalale visvasa garun ra mominaharuko imana aru dherai badhos ra kitaba manneharu ra mominale sanka nagarun ra juna manisaharuko hrdayama roga cha, uni ra kaphiraharule bhanun ki yasa drstantabata allahako ke uddesya cha? Yastai prakarale allahale jasala'i cahancha, margavicalita gardacha ra jasala'i cahancha margadarsana gardacha. Timro palanakartaka laskaraharula'i usa baheka kohi jandaina ra yo ta adamako santatiko lagi upadesa ra siksa samagri ho
Samco bhandachu (hamila'i) camdako kasama
Ra ratako jaba ki tyasale pachadi hatdacha
Ra pratahkalako jaba ki tyo prakasita bha'ihalos
Niscaya nai narka thulo kuraharumadhye eka ho
Manisaharuko nimti bhayako karana
Timadhye tyasa vyaktiko nimti jo agadi badhna cahancha va pachadi hatna cahancha
Hareka vyakti aphno karmako badalama dhito rakhi'eko cha
Tara dayam hata valaharu
Uniharu svargaharuma baseka hunechan ra prasna garnechan
Aparadhiharusamga
(ki) timila'i kuna kurole narkama lyayo
uniharule javapha dinechan ki hami namaji thi'enaum
Ra na nimukhaharula'i (miskinaharula'i) khana khuva'umthyau
ra hamile vivada garne asatyavadiharuko sathama milera vyasta hune gardathyaum
Ra badalako dina (kiyamata) la'i asatya thahara'umthyau
Yahamsam'ma ki hamila'i mutyu a'ilagyo
Atah uniharuko hakama sipharisa garneharuko sipharisale kunai pha'ida dinechaina
Uniharula'i ke bha'eko cha ki upadesabata mukha pharka'irakheka chan
Jasto ki tarseko gadhaha hun
Jo bagha dekhera bhageka chan
Baru uniharumadhye pratyeka vyakti cahancha ki usala'i khulla kitabaharu di'iyos
Yasto kahilyai hunechaina. (Satyata yo cha ki) uniharu kayamatabata nirbhika chan
Samco kura ta yo ho ki kura'ana e'uta upadesa ho
Aba jasale cahancha tyasabata upadesa hasila garos
Ra tyatikhera nai upadesa hasila garchan jaba allahale cahancha, u yasa yogya cha ki usako bhaya gariyos ra yasa yogya pani ki ksama garos
Ma kiyamatako dinako kasama khanchu
ra ma kasama khanchu tyasa naphsako (atma) jo ninda garnevala ho
Ke manisale yo thandacha ki hamile kadapi usaka hadaharula'i ekatra garnechainaum
avasya garnechaum (ra) hami yasa kurama samathryavana chaum ki usaka aunlaka tuppaharu durusta garide'aum
(Ho'ina) baru manisale cahancha ki aphno agadi–agadi avajna gardai ja'os
Sodhcha ki kiyamatako dina kahile a'umcha
jaba amkhaharu tirmira'ihalnechan
Ra candra prakasahina bha'ihalnecha
Ra surya ra candra ekatrita garinechan
Tyasa dina manisale bhannecha ki aja bhagera jane tha'um kaham cha
nihsandeha kunai saranasthala chaina
Aja ta timro palanakartatirai caina pa'ine tha'um cha
Manisaharula'i aja tyasale agadi badha'eko ra pachadi chadeko kuraharusita avagata gara'inecha
Baru manisa svayam aphno saksi cha
Yadyapi usale jati ksamayacana garna khojos
Ra (he muham'mada sallallaho alaihe vasallama!) Kura'anala'i chitai kanthastha garna aphno jibro nacala'unus
Tyasala'i ekatrita garnu ra usala'i pathaniya bana'unu hamro jim'ma cha
Atah jaba hamile tyasala'i padhchau taba tapa'ile tyasa padha'iko anusarana garnus
Ani hamro jim'mama cha usako spastikarana garnu
Ho'ina, ho'ina timi sighra prapta hune kurasita prema gardachau
Ra akhiratala'i (paralokala'i) chodirakheka chau
tyasa dina dherai anuharaharu praphullita ra gauravanvita hunechan
aphno palanakartatira (saksatkara prapta garna) dekhirakheka hunechan
Ra kaiyan anuharaharu tyasa dina udasa hunechan
Bujhnechan ki uniharumathi thulo vipada a'unevala cha
Ho'ina–ho'ina jaba prana kanthasam'ma a'ipugne cha
Ra bhaninechah ki kohi jhadaphumka garnevala cha
ra tyasale jandacha ki aba sabaibata vida'iko samaya cha
Ra e'uta khutta arko khuttasita jodinecha
Aja timile aphno palanakartatira prasthana garnucha
Tara usale nata satya man'yo na namaja padhyo
Baru jhutho thaharayo ra vimukha bhayo
Ani aphna gharavalaharuko pasama ghamanda gardai hind'ihalyo
Aphasoca cha timimathi, jhan dhikkara cha
Dhikkara cha ra kharabi cha timimathi
Ke manisale yo thandacha ki usala'i yastai chadidi'inecha
ke u e'uta baklo paniko (viryako) eka thopa thi'ena? Jasala'i tapaka'i'eko thiyo
pheri u ragatako dallo bhayo, ani allahale usala'i paida gari thikathaka garyo
Ani usaka jod'aharu banayo, purusa ra stri
Ta ke usala'i yasa kurama samathrya chaina ki mrtakaharula'i jivita parihalos
Nihsandeha manavamathi kalakhandako e'uta yasto samaya pani biteko cha jaba ki u kunai ullekhya kura thi'ena
Hamile manusyala'i e'uta misrita viryabata pariksako lagi srsti garyaum, ani hamile usala'i sunne ra dekhnevala bana'idiyaum
Hamile usala'i marga dekhayaum, aba cahe u krtajna banos va krtadhna
Niscitarupale hamile inkara garneharuko nimti hatakadi ra tauka ra prajvalita ago tayara gareka chaum
Niscaya nai sadacari manasiharule yasto peya padartha pi'unechan jasama kaphurako misrana hunecha
Yo e'uta mula ho jasabata allahaka sevakaharule pi'unechan ra tyasabata naharaharu nikalnechan
Yiniharule najara (mannata) purna gardachan ra tyasa dinabata tarsanchan jasako apada caraitira vyapaka hunecha
Ra allahasamgako premama (svayam khanako iccha bha'epani) nimukha, anathaharu ra kaidirula'i khana khuva'umchan
Hami ta kevala allahako prasannatako nimti timila'i khuva'umchau, timisita na kunai puraskara cahanchaum ra na krtajnata jnapana
Hamila'i aphno palanakartasita tyasa dinako dara lagcha, jo udasi ra atyanta kathoratavala hunecha
Atah allahale uniharula'i tyasa dinako naramro kurabata baca'ihalyaum ra uniharula'i ujjavalata ra khusi pradana garyo
Ra uniharuko santosako badalama uniharula'i jannata ra resmi vastra pradana garyo
Yiniharule tyaham palangamathi takiya laga'era baseka hunechan tyaham na suryako garmi dekhnechan na jadoko tivrata
Ra ti svargaka chayamharu unimathi jhuleka hunechan ra tyasaka phalaka gucchaharu tala jhundi'eka hunechan
(Sevakaharu) camdika bhad'aharu ra sisaka bartana li'era uniharuko caraitira ghumnechan
Sisa pani camdiko hunechan. Jasala'i thika–thika matranusara bana'eko hunecha
Ra tyaham uniharula'i yasto peya pila'inecha jasama suthoko (janjabilako) misavata hunecha
Yo svargako e'uta naharabata huncha jasako nama ‘‘salasabila” cha
Ra uniharuko asapasama sa–sana ketaharule ohoradohora garnechan jo sadaiva kisora avasthama rahanechan. Jaba timiharule uniharula'i dekhdachau taba thannechau ki tiniharu chari'eka sacca moti hun
Svargama timi jaham dekhnechau, thulo anukampa ra visala samrajya dekhnechau
Uniharuko sarirama masino hariyo resmi vastra ra baklo buttedara resmi vastra hunecha, ra uniharula'i camdiko kangana pahira'inecha ra unako palanakartale unila'i pavitra peya pila'unecha
Yo timrai karmako puraskara ho ra timro prayasako sam'mana gariyo
Niscaya nai hamile atyanta vyavasthitarupale tapa'imathi kura'ana avatarita gareka chaum
Atah aphno palanakartako adesa ra nirnaya anusara dhairyale kama garnu ra uniharumadhye kunai gunahagara va krtaghnako ajnapalana nagarnu
Ra pratahkala ra sandhyakalako samayama aphno palanakartako namako smarana garnu
Ra ratiko samayama usala'i sajda (dhogne) gara, ra abera ratisam'ma usako gunagana garnegara
Nihsandeha yiniharule chitai prapta hune sansara cahanchan ra (kayamatako) thulo dinala'i pachadi chodidinchan
Hamile uniharula'i srsti garyaum ra hamile nai unaka jorni ra gamthoharula'i baliyo banayaum ra hamile jatikhera cahanchaum uni jastala'i purnatah parivartana garidinchaum
Niscaya nai yo e'uta upadesa ho, aba jasale cahancha aphno palanakartako marga grahana garnasakcha
Ra timile cahana sakdainau, tara juna allahale cahancha nisandeha allaha sarvajna ra tatvadarsi cha
jasala'i cahancha aphno dayalutama pravesa gara'umcha ra atyacariharuko nimti usale duhkhada yatana tayara gareko cha
Hrdaya prasanna gardai bagne vayuko kasama
Ani atyanta pracanda bha'ihalne (hava)ko kasama
Ra (badalaharula'i) ucalera phija'umchan tyasako saugandha
Pheri satya ra asatyala'i alaga–alaga tukra–tukra garidine
ra vahya lya'une pharistaharuko kasama
Juna vahaya dosa utarne va savadhana garnako nimti huncha
Juna kurako timila'i vacana di'incha tyo niscaya nai pura hunevala cha
Atah jaba taraharula'i prakasahina garidi'inecha
Ra jaba akasa ksataviksata garidi'inecha
Ra jaba parvataharu tukra–tukra gari uda'idi'ine chan
Ra jaba rasulaharula'i nirdharita samayama lya'inecha
Kuna dinako nimti (yi sabaila'i) sthagita gari'eko cha
phaisalako dinako nimti
Ra timila'i ke thaha ki phaisalako dina ke ho
barbadi huncha tyasa dina asatya thahara'uneharuko nimti
Ke hamile pahilaka manisaharula'i nasta garenaum
ani hamile uniharukopachi pachikala'i lyayaum
Hamile aparadhiharusita yastai gardaichaum
Tyo dina asatya thahara'uneharuko nimti aphasoca cha
Ke hamile timila'i tuccha jala(virya) bata srsti garenaum
ani hamile tyasala'i baliyo ra suraksita tha'umma rakhyaum
E'uta niscita samayasam'ma
Pheri hamile anumana garyaum ra hami sarvottama anumana garnevala haum
Vinasa cha tyasa dina asatya thahara'uneharuko nimti
Ke hamile dharatila'i sametanevala bana'enaum
jivitala'i ra mrtaharula'i pani
Ra tyasamathi hamile agla–agla parvataharu sthapita garyaum. Ra timiharula'i santusta garne mitho pani pilayaum
tyasa dina asatya thaharya'uneharuko nimti kharabi (vinasa) cha
Juna kurola'i timile asatya thaharya'umthyau sohi narkatira hinda
tyasa chayamtira hinda jasaka tinavata hamgaharu chan
jo vastavama na chayam dincha, na ta rapabata suraksa
Nihsandeha narka agoko jhilka phyakdacha juna(thulo) killa jasta hunchan
Tyo pahelo rangaka umtaharu jasto lagcha
Aja asatya thaharya'uneharuko nimti durgati cha
Ajako dina tyo dina ho ki yiniharu bolna pani sakdainan
Nata unala'i galati svikara gari ksamayacana garna anumati di'inecha
Tyasa dina asatya thaharya'uneharuko nimti kharabi cha
Yo phaisalako dina ho, (jasama) hamile timila'i ra pahilaka manisaharula'i ekatrita gareka chaum
Tasartha yadi timi masamga kunai cala calna sakchau bhane calihala
Tyasa dina asatya thaharya'uneharuko nimti aphasoca cha
Niscaya nai sanyamiharu chayam ra jharanaharuma hunechan
Ra ti phalaharuko bicama juna uniharule ruca'umchan
(He svargabasiharu) juna karma timile gardai thiyau, tyasako pratiphalasvarupa anandasita kha'u ra pi'u
Hamile bhala'i garnevalaharuko nimti yastai pratiphala dine gardachaum
Yo dina asatyavadiharuko nimti vinasa cha
(He nastikaharu) timi ali kha'ihala ra ananda garihala, vastavama timi aparadhi hau
Tyasa dina asatya thahara'uneharuko nimti thulo vinasa cha
Jaba unisita bhanincha ki (allahako agadi) natamastaka ho'u, ta humdainan
Tyasa dina asatyavadiharuko nimti barbadi cha
Aba yasa kura'ana pascata uniharule kuna kuroma imana lya'unechan
